item.description:
The Third Polynesian Pounce!
Starring THE RUM PUNCHES! our very own Polynesian Pounce house band!
Amy, Kevin, Joe and Mike from the Skeleton Beats are back again on our Pounce stage as "The Rum Punches!"

ANNNND......We'll have a wave of special guests hopping on stage with them!
Aaron Leidecker (Mustang Cobra, Sasquatch and the Sick-a-Billys, Holy Hellraisers, King Sickabilly and the Full Moon Boys)
Myra K-rock (Ghouls Night Out, The Evil Streaks)
and more.....

DJ Trash Only and DJ E-Bomb will be spinning all sorts of Hawaiian, Surf and Exotica goodies!

BBQ from Big Moe's M&M Ribs!
Mode Merr will be returning to vend!
Retro Pop Accessories will be vending all sorts of neat-o jewelry!

Fruity, boozy drinks! BBQ! Surf and Exotica! Yowzaa!

9pm Door • 10 Bucks • 21plus


For Pounce related goodies and info, "Like" this page....
https://www.facebook.com/ThePolynesianPounce
item.name: The Polynesian Pounce at the Midway! 6-16-2012
